0.text: Innate: Ahri generates a stack of Essence Fragment whenever she kills a  minion or  monster. At 9 stacks, she consumes them to  heal herself for 35 − 95 (based on level) (+ 20% AP).
0.html: Innate: Ahri generates a stack of Essence Fragment whenever she kills a minion or monster. At 9 stacks, she consumes them to  heal herself for 35 − 95 (based on level) (+ 20% AP).

0.text: 35 − 95 (based on level)

markedPassages: minion
monster
heal
heal

1.text: Whenever Ahri scores a champion  takedown within 3 seconds of damaging them, she consumes their essence to  heal herself for 75 − 165 (based on level) (+ 30% AP).
1.html: Whenever Ahri scores a champion takedown within 3 seconds of damaging them, she consumes their essence to heal herself for 75 − 165 (based on level) (+ 30% AP).

0.text: 75 − 165 (based on level)

markedPassages: takedown
heal

0.text: RANGE:  900
Active: Ahri sends her orb in the target direction that deals magic damage to enemies hit. At maximum range, the orb homes back to her to deal the same in true damage to enemies hit.
0.html: Active: Ahri sends her orb in the target direction that deals magic damage to enemies hit. At maximum range, the orb homes back to her to deal the same in true damage to enemies hit.

1.text: Enemies can be hit only once per pass.
1.html: Enemies can be hit only once per pass.

0.text: EFFECT RADIUS:  150 / 550 / 725
Active: Ahri gains  40% bonus movement speed that decays over 2 seconds and conjures three flames which orbit her clockwise for up to 2.5 seconds.
0.html: Active: Ahri gains  40% bonus movement speed that decays over 2 seconds and conjures three flames which orbit her clockwise for up to 2.5 seconds.
markedPassages: 40% bonus movement speed

1.text: After 0.25 seconds, each flame targets a  visible enemy, or after 0.4 seconds targets the closest visible enemy in range, dealing magic damage. The damage is doubled against  minions below  20% maximum health.
1.html: After 0.25 seconds, each flame targets a visible enemy, or after 0.4 seconds targets the closest visible enemy in range, dealing magic damage. The damage is doubled against minions below  20% maximum health.
markedPassages: visible
minions
20% maximum health

2.text: Subsequent flames on a single target deal 30% damage.
2.html: Subsequent flames on a single target deal 30% damage.

3.text: Flames prioritize enemy champions hit by  Charm, then enemy  champions, then minions that would die to Fox-Fire's damage, and then the target of Ahri's last basic attack within 3 seconds.
3.html: Flames prioritize enemy champions hit by Charm, then enemy champions, then minions that would die to Fox-Fire's damage, and then the target of Ahri's last basic attack within 3 seconds.
markedPassages: Charm
champions

0.text: RANGE:  1000
Active: Ahri blows forth a kiss in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first enemy hit,  knocking them down and  charming and  slowing them by 65% for a duration.
0.html: Active: Ahri blows forth a kiss in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first enemy hit, knocking them down and charming and slowing them by 65% for a duration.
markedPassages: knocking them down
charming
slowing

0.text: TARGET RANGE: 500

Active: Ahri  dashes to the target location and then fires essence bolts to up to 3 nearby  visible enemies, each dealing magic damage. Spirit Rush can be recast twice more within 15 seconds of the activation at no additional cost, with a 1 second static cooldown between casts. Consuming a champion's essence with  Essence Theft while Spirit Rush is active extends the recast duration by and up to 10 seconds, and grants an additional recast, storing up to 3 recasts at a time.
0.html:
Active: Ahri dashes to the target location and then fires essence bolts to up to 3 nearby visible enemies, each dealing magic damage.

Spirit Rush can be recast twice more within 15 seconds of the activation at no additional cost, with a 1 second static cooldown between casts. Consuming a champion's essence with Essence Theft while Spirit Rush is active extends the recast duration by and up to 10 seconds, and grants an additional recast, storing up to 3 recasts at a time.
markedPassages: dashes
visible
Essence Theft

1.text: Recast: Ahri mimics the first cast's effects.

2.text: Spirit Rush's recast duration will persist even after having used all recasts.  Fox-Fire can be cast during the dash. Spirit Rush will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
2.html: Spirit Rush's recast duration will persist even after having used all recasts. Fox-Fire can be cast during the dash. Spirit Rush will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
markedPassages: Fox-Fire

consume.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which grants sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).
consume.originText: UNIQUE – TRINKET: Consume a charge to place an invisible  Totem Ward at the target location, which grants  sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Holds charges that refill upon visiting the shop (3 charges).
Corrupting Potion can be used even at full health and mana.
passive.originText: Holds charges that refill upon visiting the shop (3 charges).

consume.originHTML:
Consume

Consumes a charge to regenerate 5.208 health and 3.125 mana every 0.5 seconds over 12 seconds, for a total of 125 health and 75 mana. During this time, basic attacks and damaging abilities against enemy champions burn them, dealing 15 bonus magic damage over 3 seconds, increased to 20 while the user cannot regenerate mana. Bonus damage is halved for area of effect and damage over time effects.
consume.originText: Consumes a charge to regenerate 5.208 health and 3.125 mana every 0.5 seconds over 12 seconds, for a total of 125 health and 75 mana. During this time, basic attacks and damaging abilities against enemy champions burn them, dealing 15 bonus magic damage over 3 seconds, increased to 20 while the user cannot regenerate mana. Bonus damage is halved for area of effect and damage over time effects.

1.originHTML: +  350

+70 ability power
+20 ability haste
+250 health
+600 mana

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Glaciate: Unleash a fan of icy shards in a cone in the target direction, dealing 100 (+ 30% AP) magic damage to all enemies hit and slowing them by 65% for 1 second. Enemies struck in the center of the cone are rooted for the same duration instead (30 second cooldown).
active.originText: UNIQUE – GLACIATE: Unleash a fan of icy shards in a cone in the target direction, dealing 100 (+ 30% AP) magic damage to all enemies hit and  slowing them by 65% for 1 second. Enemies struck in the center of the cone are  rooted for the same duration instead (30 second cooldown).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 10 ability power.
passive.originText: MYTHIC PASSIVE: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 10 ability power.

Passive

Active
